Stage 0 (Carcinoma in Situ)
		                    Treatment of stage 0 may include the following:         -  Surgery (wedge resection or segmental resection).     -  Photodynamic therapy for tumors in or near the bronchus.     - Electrocautery, cryosurgery, or laser surgery for tumors in or near the bronchus.
